item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, December 1, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. France riled by Trump pick of Charles Kushner as Paris envoy
2. Number of candidates sitting chartered financial analyst exams falls sharply
3. Elon Musk is attacking Britain. Former PMs are building ties
4. Trump threatens Brics nations with 100% tariffs if they undermine dollar
5. Trump picks hardline ‘deep state’ critic Kash Patel as new FBI head
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, December 1, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
